OOC: Kinger in order to be on mhis back you'd have to be under him.  
Besides his wings would be directly in between you and his arms if 
you did get on his back.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Galvatron watched as the bot speed past. He flipped up to miss the 
slash and 
> used all his force to go straight down on top of the bot. He was on 
the bots 
> back. He wrapped his legs around the bots waist. He took his left 
arm and 
> grabbed the bots left fore arm to keep it down. He used his right 
arm to grab 
> the bots right forearm. He wrapped his tail around the bots left 
shoulder and 
> yanked it with all his strength to the left. Ripping it off. 
(because I am 
> right on top I am allowed to post some damage.) His teeth shined in 
the sun. 
> He took a large bite into the bots right shoulder. His teeth 
clenching in. He 
> pulled to the right with enormous power most likley ripping off 
that arm 
> unless the bot had some type of super glue holding him togeather. 
To make 
> sure her through out his fire energy wich would incenerate it on 
contact. 
> When his tail had wrapped aroung the left shoulder the end stuck 
into the 
> bots ribs.  Sucking out his mech fluid and into galvatron. His 
green jewel 
> glowed and shot a beam right through the bots upper back area. Wich 
would 
> come out his middle chest.his knee guns shoit multiple energys into 
the bots 
> sides. Galvatron smiled with his teeth in the bots right shoulder 
as the 
> flame energy came out with a muffle sound he said.... "Some things 
just 
> shouldnt tast like chicken."
